## Eastern Tropical Pacific Species Classifier

This is a Random Forest classifier model, and can classify 7 different species and 1 genus: Globicephala macrorhynchus, Pseudorca crassidens, Steno bredanensis, Stenella attenuata, Stenella coeruleoalba, Stenella longirostris, Tursiops truncatus, Delphinus species. For details see the full description in the download zip file
